function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Person-to-person transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Fear and reluctance to travel, leading to a decline in tourist arrivals","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, promoting vaccination, and providing accurate information about transmission risks","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and air filtration systems","People":"Travelers, tourism operators, and hospitality staff","Owner":"Government health authorities, tourism boards, and hospitality industry"},{"Description":"Long incubation period of COVID-19","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals, leading to potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Quarantine measures for travelers, widespread testing, and monitoring of symptoms","Technologies":"PCR testing kits, rapid antigen testing, and digital health passports","People":"Travelers, healthcare workers, and local communities","Owner":"Government health agencies, healthcare providers, and travel organizations"},{"Description":"Decrease in tourist arrivals due to virus outbreaks","Impact":"Economic downturn and reduced revenue in the tourism industry","Mitigation":"Promoting alternative attractions, diversifying tourism offerings, and implementing flexible cancellation policies","Technologies":"Virtual reality tourism experiences, online booking platforms, and destination marketing tools","People":"Tourism operators, local businesses, and government tourism agencies","Owner":"Destination management organizations, tourism boards, and local governments"}]}
